name: Dinosaur Hunters 2
description:
We are here with the new game of the dinosaur hunter series. new weapons, new missions, hunting with your sniper rifle Are you ready to add a new Dinosaur Hunter games?
Trex dinosaur friends and their settlements, attacking towns and villages. People are still in the house.

Sniper rifle with dinosaurs you must stop them before they destroy all the houses. Timing and speed is very important.

Use your bullets sparingly. Each new chapter in levels of increasing difficulty, dinosaurs waiting to demolish houses.

High-quality graphics,
Realistic sounds,
Refurbished sniper weapon,
New types of dinosaurs

Dinosaur Hunter 2 is waiting for you to play .
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
